title: Systematic desensitization to overcome fear of dog

content.question: A therapist using systematic desensitization to help a client overcome a fear of big dogs would probably begin treatment by asking the client to

choices.label: walk into a room where there is a small dog
describe her past experience with dogs
master a set of relaxation techniques

content.answer: master a set of relaxation techniques

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
